messages.subject: Rashid ad-Din's Book
messages.msgSnippet: Dear Group members: Hi, does anybody hear of a full English translation of Rashid ad-Din Jami at-tawarikh(complete collection of histories)? I learned that
messages.messageBody:
Dear Group members:
Hi, does anybody hear of a 'full' English translation
of Rashid ad-Din' Jami' at-tawarikh(complete
collection of histories)?
I learned that there is a 'partial' translation by
Boyle, J. A, which I also could find on the web. But,
I could not confirm that there is no 'full' Enlish
translation.
Since Boyle's book is a little expensive to buy, I
want to make sure that there is no other alternative
to his book before purchasing his.

I will appreicate if any of historians here could help
me with this. Thank you.






Sincerely,





Changsub Lee
